main event: Several sightings of unusual flying objects were reported in South Boston, Virginia, between January and April 1965.
interesting points: Witness Richard Wharff described a large, glowing object with a metallic-like surface and blinking lights., The object hovered for approximately 8 minutes before ascending vertically., Mr. and Mrs. Johnson reported seeing a cigar-shaped object that appeared to give off a reddish glow., None of the reports were substantiated with physical evidence., The occurrences were classified as natural phenomena or unidentified by the Air Force.
sighted object: large glowing object and cigar-shaped object
witness description: family members and Mr. and Mrs. Johnson
